definition: topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]

sentences.english: Written expression is an important test content in English entrance examination questions.
sentences.chinese: 書面表達題是高考英語試題中的一項重要測試內容。

sentences.english: University teachers do graduate and doctoral entrance exam questions will be, too.
sentences.chinese: 大學老師做研究生和博士生入學考試試題也會如此。

sentences.english: This section contains the review and actual quiz materials for the course.
sentences.chinese: 此部分包括課程複習資料和測驗的全真試題。

sentences.english: All the maths problems on the test paper are difficult, so that I couldn't work out them all.
sentences.chinese: 試卷上的所有數學試題都很難，以致於我都做不出來。

sentences.english: This is the sort of question you might encounter on an IQ test.
sentences.chinese: 這種類型的問題你經常會在智商測試題中遇到。

sentences.english: This paper introduces how to design a small scale general-purpose question bank system used for examinations.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一種小型通用試題庫系統的設計方法。

sentences.english: After you finish the test, go over it and correct your mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 答完試題仔細檢查一下，把錯的改正過來。

sentences.english: This file is the calendar year, National Computer Grade 4 examination papers.
sentences.chinese: 此文件是歷年全國計算機4級等級考試試題。

sentences.english: Tests are similar to recent actual GREs in length, question types, and degree of difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 模擬試題長度和難度接近真實考試。

sentences.english: "Most teachers give out practice exams and old exams anyway," she said.
sentences.chinese: “事實上，多數老師都會給出習題或舊試題”她說。

sentences.english: My sister went to the river and A Fu followed her.
sentences.chinese: 年試題中表達“妹妹走向河邊阿福跟隨。

sentences.english: Anyway, I finished editing grade seven's test paper at last.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，我終於編輯完了七年級的考試題。

sentences.english: This section provides the two quizzes for the course.
sentences.chinese: 這個部分提供兩套考試題。

sentences.english: College Entrance Examination during the life of the system has a strictly regulated process.
sentences.chinese: 高考試題的命制過程有着嚴格的規範程序。

sentences.english: He proposes a quiz to tell whether you are a member
sentences.chinese: 他提出一個測試題，來驗證你是否是X世代的一員。

sentences.english: Do not add anything to the question or to the answer.
sentences.chinese: 對試題或答案不要增加任何東西。

definition: proposition (logic, math.)/to assign an essay topic
to put forward plans and ideas (also derogatory)/to give advice (idiom)
a test/determination/to check up on/to examine/to assay
International Mathematical Olympiad (IMO)/abbr. for 國際奧林匹克數學競賽|国际奥林匹克数学竞赛[Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Shu4 xue2 Jing4 sai4]
lit. looking for a fine horse using only a picture (idiom)/fig. to do things along rigid, conventional lines/to try and find sth with the help of a clue
